DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate short-term effect acupuncture intraocular pressure ( IOP ) . Methods : A randomized control trial . Healthy volunteer randomly allocate three group : Acupuncture group - submit 20-minute session acupuncture needle insert specific point ( Tong Zi Liao , Yang Bai Jing Ming ) ; Sham group - submit 20- minute session acupuncture needle insert false point locate 1 cm true point area without acupuncture 's meridian ; Control group - intervention . IOP measurement mask investigator use Goldmann applanation tonometry immediately intervention , well 30 minute 24 hour acupuncture .
DOC.criteria: healthy volunteer glaucoma past intraocular surgery corneal alteration medication interfere intraocular pressure
